revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Thrifty Megamart |image = [[File:Thrifty Megamart.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Thrifty Megmart. |tokens = 1,025,000 |location = South of Tapu Village }}
'''Thrifty Megamart''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, The [[Gyms#Alola|Ghostium-Z]] [[File:GhostiumZ.png|30px]] is awarded upon clearing this dungeon, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 14,705,422 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
